content:
There are a number of interesting "open science" / "open data" AGU sessions this year:

  1. Flourishing Science Commons: Data Science, Open Science, and Knowledge Communities
  2. Analysis Ready Data: Best Practices, Challenges, and Standards
  3. Accelerating Science: The Convergence of Inclusive Computational Resources, Cloud-Optimized Data, Open-Source Tools, and Open Collaborative Communities
  4. CF and NetCDF: 30 Years of Wide Open Science
  5. Hacking a Path Across the Last Mile: Empowering Stakeholders, Communities, Educators, and Youth to Effectively Access and Use Open Data to Learn About and Tackle Local and Global Challenges

More relevant AGU sessions:

  • Voices from the Global Open Science Community: Showcasing Progress, Challenges, and Lessons Learned
  • Climate Data Portals: Design, Operation, and Applications
  • Next Generation of Advanced Visualization in Earth Science
  • The Dawn of the Era of Cloud based Climate Informatics
  • Science Towards Openness
  • Data and Information Services for Interdisciplinary Research and Applications in Earth Science
